model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Neighbors A, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: I just got back from my trip to South America. It was amazing!
Neighbors B: Oh really? Where did you go?

[MEMORY]
Neighbors A and B both believe in the importance of learning and self-improvement. They also believe in doing nice things for others to bring the community together. Additionally, Neighbors A is very organized in their room and house and never wastes time searching for things. Neighbors A and B took a cooking class together last year, and Neighbor B remembers the incident. Neighbor B mentions struggling with keeping their room tidy and wasting time looking for things. Furthermore, Neighbor B expresses concern about the safety of hooking up with strangers and advises caution.
